issue.title: [C#][CI] The docker container fails to run on Github Actions because of the ubuntu host version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7123](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7123). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So the current linux build runs directly on the host. See issue [dotnet/core#3509](https://github.com/dotnet/core/issues/3509)
